ygData.subject: Re: Wordsmithing
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I m convinced, songweaving or weaving for short gets my vote. although I can see humans calling it juggling just to be difficult.  Heh heh.  Notice the
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I'm convinced, songweaving or weaving for short gets my vote.
although I can see humans calling it juggling just to be difficult. Heh
heh. Notice the human's don't really seem to have guilds? They just hang
out in music shops and call it good. More laid back in some ways, while we
woodsies are more spiritual about our music.

Kitasi, Songweaver of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 10:57 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Wordsmithing


From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>

Well being a Wood Elf Bard and hence a member of the Kelethin Songweavers
guild I vote for weaving :)


Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
